profile.description: Hi, my name is Yuri Koshiishi. I'm a Web Developer who's passionate about JavsScript. Currently located in Japan.

jobDescriptions: Worked on official e-commerce sites for Under Armour (Global Sports Apparel) and DNS (Japanese Sports Supplement).
Localized Under Armour e-commerce site for Japan in collaboration with North America and APAC Teams, including translations as well as interpreting, issue handling and testing functionalities.
Implemented various A/B tests through Adobe Target as well as creating landing pages and in-site contents with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Recovered CVR for Under Armour e-commerce site by 60% in cooperation with Adobe team, using in-depth analysis to improve UX, after it dropped down due to e-commerce platform renewal.
Built an in-house chrome extension tool. (TypeScript, React)
Renewed a corporate website working with a UI designer. (HTML, SASS, JavaScript, PHP)
Migrated frontend build tools from gulp + compass to webpack. (JavaScript)
Frontend developer responsible for web app development using mainly React and serverless architecture.
Developed an ecommerce marketplace with React, Firebase and Shopify.
Worked with a team on AMP based media websites/CMS using Next.js and Firebase.

descriptions: Online coaching platform built for personal trainers in Japan.
Built SPA frontend in React, with Firebase backend for authentication, NoSQL database, and serverless functions.
Integrated 3rd party solutions such as Stripe for billing, and SendGrid for sending emails.
Core functionalities include workout logging, schedule sharing, real-time messaging, etc.
Product review sharing platform build with Next.js, Express, and PostgreSQL.
Deployed in VPS using Docker and nginx
Core functionalities include posting/liking/sorting/filtering reviews, product search, etc.
